faq.title: Ultra FAQ

faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team

items.question: What makes Nano Banana Ultra different?
items.answer: Nano Banana Ultra is the official Ultra-level optimization platform for Nano Banana AI models. Our proprietary Ultra Intent Analysis technology transforms short ideas into professional prompts, delivering consistent Ultra-quality results. Note: Nano Banana Ultra is an independent platform not affiliated with Google.

items.question: How is Ultra different from standard Nano Banana?
items.answer: While Nano Banana and Nano Banana Pro are Google's AI image models, Nano Banana Ultra is our optimization layer that maximizes their potential. Think of Ultra as the professional studio that brings out the best in these powerful models.

items.question: What's included in the free Ultra tier?
items.answer: Free Ultra users get 3 prompt generations per day without signup. Create an account to receive bonus Ultra credits for image generation. Premium credit packages are available for power users.

items.question: Does Ultra support image generation?
items.answer: Yes! The Ultra Prompt Lab generates both optimized prompts and instant image previews. Export your Ultra-enhanced prompts to any compatible AI image platform.

items.question: Do I need technical skills to use Ultra?
items.answer: Zero technical skills required. Simply type a short idea like 'sunset portrait' and Ultra Intent Analysis automatically adds professional parameters‚Äîlighting, composition, camera settings, and artistic style.

items.question: What are Ultra and Ultra Pro modes?
items.answer: Ultra mode uses the fast Nano Banana model for quick iterations. Ultra Pro mode leverages Nano Banana Pro for maximum fidelity and semantic depth‚Äîideal for professional and commercial work.

items.question: How does Ultra Refinement work?
items.answer: Ultra Refinement is our one-click enhancement system. Adjust lighting, perspective, style intensity, and more through intuitive controls‚Äîno prompt editing required.

items.question: Can I remix prompts from the Ultra Gallery?
items.answer: Absolutely! Browse the Ultra Gallery, find inspiring styles, and click 'Ultra Remix' to use any prompt as your creative starting point. Full prompt transparency on every creation.

items.question: Are Ultra-generated prompts commercially usable?
items.answer: Yes. All prompts created with Nano Banana Ultra are yours to use commercially. For generated images, see our terms of service for full licensing details.

ai_image_generator_faq.title: AI Image Generator FAQ
ai_image_generator_faq.description: Common questions about our AI image generation tool.

items.question: What is Nano Banana Ultra AI Image Generator?
items.answer: Nano Banana Ultra is a cutting-edge web tool that allows anyone to create professional images using artificial intelligence. It transforms text descriptions into visuals and can even edit existing photos using advanced models like Gemini and FLUX.

items.question: Is Nano Banana Ultra AI Image Generator free?
items.answer: Yes, we offer free daily credits for all users. You can generate high-quality AI images using Gemini and other models without any subscription.

items.question: Can I use generated images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! Images generated on Nano Banana Ultra come with a commercial usage license, meaning you own the rights to your creations for marketing, products, or creative projects.

items.question: How does the Image-to-Image feature work?
items.answer: Image-to-Image allows you to upload an existing photo as a reference. The AI then uses your text prompts to modify the image's style, composition, or details while preserving the core structure of your upload.

items.question: Which AI models are supported?
items.answer: We support multiple state-of-the-art models including Google Gemini, OpenAI GPT-4o, and FLUX.1 for diverse artistic styles, from photorealistic to anime.

items.question: How do I write effective prompts?
items.answer: Be specific about subject, style, lighting, and mood. You can also use our built-in 'AI Prompt Optimizer' to automatically enhance your simple ideas into professional prompts.

items.question: What formats are the images downloaded in?
items.answer: Images are provided in high-resolution PNG or JPG formats, optimized for both web use and printing.
